problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AC是⊙O的切线,连接OC交⊙O于点D．连接BD,∠C=36°,则∠B的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is the tangent of ⊙O, connecting OC to ⊙O at point D. Connect BD, ∠C = N_0, then the degree of ∠B is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查切线的性质、圆周角定理等知识,解题的关键是熟练掌握基本知识,属于中考常考题型．
